content: Panspermia is the theory that life on Earth could have originated from space-faring microbes from Mars or beyond, transported via an interplanetary highway of asteroids.
Extremophile bacteria may possess sufficient resilience to endure the three-stage journey through space, potentially by repairing damaged DNA or entering hibernation.
The chemistry of life could be spreading across solar systems to other parts of the galaxy, creating a vast, interconnected web of biologies.
